JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: IP Network Installation, Troubleshooting and Maintenance.Provide support like initial site survey, router configuration, cabling, wireless cpe installation, PC hardware and software related  installation and troubleshooting   etc.  to the corporate customers.Follow-up with customers and take update from them regularly to build a friendly professional relationship.Network up gradation and  installation planning, designing, monitoring and reporting. .Advanced knowledge in Mikrotik & WiFi is mandatory.

Age 23 to 30 years
